title: Overheating and cpu shut down
body:
I have been having overheating on my computer lately which have been caused by lol games actually, and my cpu just suddently shuts down. I get the banning for 10 minutes but now I am ban for 10 minutes - two straight game in a row. WHAT?!

Can somebody help me fix this issue without having to buy another computer?

Thanks

replies.body:
I think its the new client or something

the same thing has been happening to me recently. Id recommend updating all drivers,cleaning out PC fans and moving PC to a spot with good air flow and circulation. Keep ur comp as cool as possible. Test out other games for like an hour and so while monitoring your temperature with Speccy. If you crash in other games not just LoL then its a computer problem and you might need to look into a better cooling system or new video card

PC's shutting down like this act as a safety precaution against overheating and hardware failure.  Even if your leaving isn't intentional, they still cause others a negative experience and you're also closer to ruining your pc.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we see how we might help.  We'll get back to you!
